name: The Slayer's Fate
description:
The Slayer's Fate

Take out as many demons as you can, as time rushes you towards your fate. But take care, some enemies cannot be hurt, only dodged.

It may some time for the game to pick up in difficulty, so please stick with it for a while!

Made by Gong-Fan (Billy) Bao for the DATT2300 course at York University.

Controls:

Player Movement - Up, Down

Attack - Space

Quit - Esc
